Description: We aim for education that fosters the power of independent thinking rather than simple rote memorization.
Payments can be made via PayPal, Stripe, and all major credit cards.
Class participation may be temporarily restricted if tuition is overdue for more than one week.
Invoices are sent to the registered parent's email immediately upon payment.
Material fees are waived for students who pay for 3 months in advance.
Tuition payment certificates can be printed directly from the 'My Page' section.
If international card payment fails, please request a PayPal invoice.
Discounts cannot be stacked; the single highest discount rate will be applied.
A 10% discount on the total amount is provided when two or more family members enroll.
100% refund before start; 2/3 before 1/3 of term; 1/2 before 1/2 of term.
Regular one-on-one interviews with students are conducted twice every semester.
We strictly follow a 50-minute lecture and 10-minute break rule for long classes.
Full-scale mock exams are held quarterly to analyze academic performance.
The 'Student of the Month' is selected based on homework scores and classroom attitude.
Monthly achievement reports are sent via Google Docs at the end of each month.
Weekly learning objectives and progress charts are sent out every Monday.
Portfolio consulting is provided for students preparing for higher education admissions.
Attendance notifications are sent to parents 10 minutes after the class begins.
Entry and attendance tracking are managed through mobile student ID cards.
All instructors hold a Master’s degree or higher or have over 5 years of experience.
All classes offer a choice between English or Korean as the primary language.
We specialize in STEM education and Design Thinking-based learning models.
The curriculum is revamped annually to reflect the latest global educational trends.
Attendance is restricted for contagious illnesses until a full recovery is confirmed.
Exit locations and emergency evacuation routes are posted next to every classroom door.
Phones are prohibited during class and must be stored in designated lockers.
Minors are strictly prohibited from leaving the campus during class hours without consent.
Food is prohibited in classrooms; only lidded beverages are permitted.
Unauthorized reproduction or sharing of course materials and videos is illegal.
Three instances of tardiness are treated as one unexcused absence, resulting in a warning.
Immediate expulsion may occur for disrupting others or using abusive language.
A dedicated VPN guide is provided for international students to ensure stable access.
Contact the IT support team via email for any Google account login issues.
Academic data is stored for 1 year after graduation before permanent deletion.
Vocabulary tests and grade tracking are available through our dedicated learning app.
Server maintenance is performed every Sunday from 02:00 to 04:00 (Local Time).
Personal headsets are recommended for language-focused classes.
Short-term immersive camps are operated during summer and winter breaks.
Shuttle bus services are currently suspended due to safety reasons.
Scholarships are awarded to top performers and students with significant improvement.
A completion ceremony is held every February for students finishing regular courses.
Paid trial fees are refunded if the student enrolls in a regular course afterward.
A $20 voucher is given to the referrer when a new student joins via recommendation.
Online webinars are held at the start of each semester to discuss operations.
Opinions are collected and addressed via an anonymous Google Form.
Monthly newsletters containing educational info are sent at the start of each month.
Phone support is fastest on weekdays between 14:00 and 17:00.
All major announcements are delivered through the official Slack #Announcements channel.
All assignments must be uploaded to Google Classroom by the deadline.
Fridays are dedicated to team projects and student presentations.
Review videos are shared within 24 hours of a live session and remain for 7 days.
A basic diagnostic test via Google Forms is required before enrollment.
We operate a 1:1 mentoring program with senior students for peer support.
Recordings or make-up sessions are provided only if notified 24 hours in advance.
Classes are limited to a maximum of 8 students for intensive management.
In-house PDF lecture notes are provided; external textbooks must be purchased.
We offer a hybrid approach combining in-person and live Google Meet sessions.
Individualized schedules can be checked in real-time via Google Sheets.
Students must watch a 5-minute concept video before attending class (Flipped Learning).
Classrooms are open for self-study on weekends from 10:00 to 12:00.
Post questions to Slack #Q&A outside class hours for a response within 24 hours.
Grading is based on a mix of written exams, portfolios, and participation.
End-of-term project presentations are broadcasted via YouTube Live for parents.
Personal lockers are assigned to students enrolled for 3 months or longer.
Classroom temperatures are maintained at 24°C for a comfortable environment.
Items are kept at the front desk for one week before being discarded.
Empty classrooms can be booked in advance as quiet study spaces.
Free high-speed Giga Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus.
Water purifiers are in the lounge; use of personal cups is encouraged.
Specialized LED study lights are used to minimize eye fatigue.
iPads or Galaxy Tabs are available for use during class if needed.
In the event of an unavoidable instructor change, a 1-week notice will be given.
Google Chat alerts are sent to registered emergency contacts in critical situations.
The academy is closed on national holidays; make-up dates will be announced.
Schedule consultations via the shared Google Calendar link.
Weekdays 13:00–22:00, Saturdays 09:00–18:00. Closed Sundays.
Located in front of Exit 5, Central Station (see Google Maps).
A 10% discount is available at nearby bookstores upon showing a student ID.
A 1-hour free parking voucher is provided for visitors.
Kits for coding and robotics classes are available for rental.
